I'm learning PHP and I don't have frontpage so I'm using it has an alternative thanks [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] Warez are forbidden[/center]

item.title: PHP Designer 2007 Pro
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:
@inertia wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:5, topic:309701”][quote author=inertia link=topic=406147.msg3001850#msg3001850 date=1256066528]
I got PHP Designer 2007 Pro (legally ofc) and ended up using notepad because it was so buggy and annoying so don’t waste your time.

I never considered another IDE, but an eclipse plugin sounds good. I’m downloading it now:

http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/download.php?file=/technology/epp/downloads/release/galileo/SR1/eclipse-php-galileo-SR1-win32.zip

IDE’s for real languages like PHP don’t help you in the same way frontpage helps you with HTML - you have to understand the language just as good as you would without it.
[/quote]PHP is no real language, it is a joke. Ps, Zend Studio is great for this kind of stuff.[/quote]

It’s more of a language than HTML, don’t diss my point coz I speak like a retard.

Read full topic

item.title: PHP Designer 2007 Pro

@inertia wrote:

I got PHP Designer 2007 Pro (legally ofc) and ended up using notepad because it was so buggy and annoying so don’t waste your time.

I never considered another IDE, but an eclipse plugin sounds good. I’m downloading it now:

IDE’s for real languages like PHP don’t help you in the same way frontpage helps you with HTML - you have to understand the language just as good as you would without it.
